CustomField.formula: IF ( AND(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Propose"), IsAPMSApplication__c ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OpportunityAgreement?id=" &Id&"&recordTypeId="+ $Label.APT_SOPRecordTypeID ,IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_SOP_Contract", "Create SOP Contract"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Create SOP Contract
